document.title: Technical Bulletins: Civil Penalties for Wastewater Pretreatment Violations
document.abstract: This Technical Bulletin provides an overview (not a comprehensive analysis) of the Attorney General's opinion concerning the amount of the penalty that a municipality can charge for wastewater pretreatment violations.
